subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Gerald Wallace scored 29 points, including the final 4 of the game, and the Charlotte Bobcats beat the Philadelphia 76ers, 101-98, to end a three-game losing streak.
snippet: Gerald Wallace scored 29 points, including the final 4 of the game, and the Charlotte Bobcats beat the Philadelphia 76ers, 101-98, to end a three-game losing streak.
